00002 #define _FSUIPC_H_
00003 
00004 // Supported Sims
00005 #define SIM_ANY     0
00006 #define SIM_FS98    1
00007 #define SIM_FS2K    2
00008 #define SIM_CFS2    3
00009 #define SIM_CFS1    4
00010 #define SIM_FLY               5
00011 #define SIM_FS2K2   6
00012 #define SIM_FS2K4   7
00013 #define SIM_FSX               8
00014 #define SIM_ESP               9
00015 
00016 // Error numbers
00017 #define FSUIPC_ERR_OK                   0
00018 #define FSUIPC_ERR_OPEN                 1         // Attempt to Open when already Open
00019 #define FSUIPC_ERR_NOFS                 2         // Cannot link to FSUIPC or WideClient
00020 #define FSUIPC_ERR_REGMSG     3         // Failed to Register common message with Windows
00021 #define FSUIPC_ERR_ATOM                 4         // Failed to create Atom for mapping filename
00022 #define FSUIPC_ERR_MAP                  5         // Failed to create a file mapping object
00023 #define FSUIPC_ERR_VIEW                 6         // Failed to open a view to the file map
00024 #define FSUIPC_ERR_VERSION    7         // Incorrect version of FSUIPC, or not FSUIPC
00025 #define FSUIPC_ERR_WRONGFS    8         // Sim is not version requested
00026 #define FSUIPC_ERR_NOTOPEN    9         // Call cannot execute, link not Open
00027 #define FSUIPC_ERR_NODATA     10        // Call cannot execute: no requests accumulated
00028 #define FSUIPC_ERR_TIMEOUT    11        // IPC timed out all retries
00029 #define FSUIPC_ERR_SENDMSG    12        // IPC sendmessage failed all retries
00030 #define FSUIPC_ERR_DATA                 13        // IPC request contains bad data
00031 #define FSUIPC_ERR_RUNNING    14        // Maybe running on WideClient, but FS not running on Server, or wrong FSUIPC
00032 #define FSUIPC_ERR_SIZE                 15        // Read or Write request cannot be added, memory for Process is full
00033 
00034 #ifdef __cplusplus
00035 extern "C" {
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 // Globals accessible from main code
00039 extern DWORD FSUIPC_Version;  // HIWORD is 1000 x Version Number, minimum 1998
00040                                                                                                     // LOWORD is build letter, with a = 1 etc. For 1998 this must be at least 5 (1998e)
00041 extern DWORD FSUIPC_FS_Version;
00042                                                                                                     // FS98=1, FS2k=2, CFS2=3. See above.
00043 extern DWORD FSUIPC_Lib_Version;
00044                                                                                                     // HIWORD is 1000 x version, LOWORD is build letter, a = 1 etc.
00045 
00046 // Library routines
00047 extern BOOL FSUIPC_Open(DWORD dwFSReq, DWORD *pdwResult); // For use externally (IPCuser.lib)
00048 extern BOOL FSUIPC_Open2(DWORD dwFSReq, DWORD *pdwResult, BYTE *pMem, DWORD dwSize); // For use internally (ModuleUser.lib)
00049 extern void FSUIPC_Close(void);
00050 extern BOOL FSUIPC_Read(DWORD dwOffset, DWORD dwSize, void *pDest, DWORD *pdwResult);
00051 extern BOOL FSUIPC_ReadSpecial(DWORD dwOffset, DWORD dwSize, void *pDest, DWORD *pdwResult);
00052 extern BOOL FSUIPC_Write(DWORD dwOffset, DWORD dwSize, void *pSrce, DWORD *pdwResult);
00053 extern BOOL FSUIPC_Process(DWORD *pdwResult);
00054 
00055 #ifdef __cplusplus
